I have worked on Del Lloyd’s team for over two years.  Del consistently exhibits superior leadership skills and creativity.  She provides excellent insights and mentoring to her team members while maintaining positive team spirit.  Del is concerned not only about the current performance of her team but also about their professional development.  With her extensive project background Del understands both the details of managing projects and navigation through complex projects and processes.  She is able to coach her team members in efficiently completing required duties and in partnering with all project stakeholders.  Del is well known, well respected, and well liked in the organization.  She works effectively across organizational “boundaries;” with all levels of the organization; and with stakeholders having diverse interests.  Her negotiation skills are impressive.  I view her as a valued role model as an admirable leader, recognized expert, and effective manager.

summary: Senior PMP-certified Project & Program Manager with extensive experience in both technical and business project management (full life cycle) and as leader of project management teams. Record of successful application development and implementation in numerous technical environments. Extensive business knowledge combined with excellent technical leadership and communication skills. Demonstrated ability to work cross-functionally with all levels in an organization, to effectively manage multiple projects simultaneously, and to quickly adapt to changing organizational priorities and directions. Experienced in directing business process and system redesign projects, in staffing, and in managing budgets from feasibility through deployment and system retirement. Fluent in MS Project and numerous project management methodologies and procedures, including PMI processes, RUP, Agile, and RAD.Specialties: PMP. Team building, Finance, Analysis, SDLC, Leadership, RUP, negotiation, communication, mergers and acquisitions, banking, project management, business process integration, banking website management
